Code docs¶

main.add_csv_data(data_file, data)[source]¶

This function is used to add data to te logfile, pass in te name of the file and the data to be written. Uses the csv library

Parameters:
  • data_file – The name of the file that we are going to log to
  • data – Data to be written to te file
main.create_csv(data_file)[source]¶

This function creates a logfile, and adds te first row with column eaders, pass in the name of te file

Parameters:data_file – Create a CSV file with headers for eac column
main.get_image_thresholds(image_array)[source]¶

This function takes an image array and finds the average value for each (non black) pixel, ith then returns scaled values for the thresholds for deciding whether a pixel is cloud or not. It uses the constant THRESHOLD_SCALE

Parameters:image_array – Takes an image converted to a nparray [width][height][R,G,B]
Returns:The treshold values for RGB
main.get_time_stamp()[source]¶

This function returns a string timestamp suitable for use in filenames

Returns:The current Date/time ormatted as a string suitable for a filename
main.read_file(file_name)[source]¶

This function reads the database of power stations from the file supplied and returns a 2d list of power stations

Parameters:file_name – The name of the csv file to read
Returns:2d list of power stations
